sentences.en: "I'm scared," she said in a very small voice.
sentences.cn: 她非常小声地说：“我很害怕。”

sentences.en: At first, he was really scared.
Ella was scared that someone was watching her.
sentences.cn: 有个人一直在监视埃拉，这让她很害怕。

sentences.en: God Almighty, Hart, you scared me silly.
sentences.cn: 哎呀，哈特，你把我都吓傻了！

sentences.en: He was feeling guilty and depressed, repentant and scared.
sentences.cn: 他感到内疚、沮丧、后悔和害怕。

sentences.en: I don't believe for one minute she would have been scared.
sentences.cn: 我压根不认为她会有所畏惧。

sentences.en: I think everyone was scared of her.
I was scared by the hullabaloo over my arrival.
sentences.cn: 人声鼎沸的欢迎场面把我吓了一跳。

sentences.en: I was scared stiff when I realized what I'ddone.
sentences.cn: 当我意识到自己的所作所为时，我吓坏了。

sentences.en: I was too scared to move.
I'm scared of the dark. I'm a big chicken.
sentences.cn: 我怕黑，是个十足的胆小鬼。
我很害怕。不是开玩笑，真的。

sentences.en: In high school I was scared to death of you.
sentences.cn: 高中时我怕你怕得要命。

sentences.en: One thing I am sure of was that she was scared.
sentences.cn: 有一点我能肯定，那就是她当时被吓到了。

sentences.en: They feel scared and powerless in conveyor-belt hospital wards.
sentences.cn: 在千篇一律的病房里，他们感到恐惧而又无能为力。

phrases.tran_cn: 吓得要死；被吓死；害怕得要命

trans.tran_en: frightened of something, or nervous about something
